Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje took career-best figures of 4 for 7
Ottneil Baartman took a wicket with his first ball
Aiden Markram was dismissed by Dasun Shanaka
Miscellaneous Highlights: The up-and-down surface made the target of 78 challenging for South Africa
The venue has big square boundaries, which are difficult to breach
127 out of the 214 balls faced by the batters in this game were dots, the most dots in a Men's T20 World Cup game
Others: Firdose Moonda is ESPNcricinfo's correspondent for South Africa and women's cricket
